description:
Awesome FREE Slushy Maker Game!! Have you always wanted to make your own slushies? Well download this app now and get in on the fun that everyone else is talking about.

Crazy about slushies??? Craving for that fun swirly feeling? Here is your chance to create your own amazing slushies! Have fun with Crazy Slushy Drink Maker Mania Making Machine Free!

This awesome and fabulously cool games comes packed with awesome coolness it will make your hand totally freeze! Create your own cool swirly slushy with totally unlimited combination you can customize your decors with!

Create your own crazy masterpiece you can share and have fun with your friends! Enjoy the many options and combination including cups, straws, flavors, labels, stickers and a whole lot more!

Download this fabulously cool FREE game now and have a swirly slushy fun of your life!
